text: Laval is a commune and the prefecture of the French department of Mayenne. The people that live there are called Lavallois. ==History== Laval is a medieval city and was first mentioned during the 11th century. == Education == * École supérieure d'informatique, électronique, automatique ==Sister cities== Laval is twinned with: * Boston, United Kingdom, since 1958 * Modesto, USA * Chalkidiki, Greece. * Gandia, Spain, since 1978 * Garango, Burkina Faso * Laval, Canada * Mettmann, Germany, since 1974 * Vătava, Romania, since 1990 Category:Communes in Mayenne Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Laval (Mayenne)
